intro.description: Test that the browser opens and closes.

item.title: Reopen browser
item.description: Without closing the browser that opened in the previous test case, choose "Help"->"Help" Contents" from the workbench menu. No new browser window should launch, and the existing help browser should load the table of contents, with lists of books on the left, and "Welcome to Eclipse help" document on the right.

item.title: Close Browser
item.description: Close the help browser. Browser window should close.
